reviews.review: skrt

One of my favorite multiplayer games ever! It's tense, but not too scary for the average player. There are a few bugs in the game, but the devs fix bugs and glitches on a weekly basis. Survivor versus Killer is generally speaking well balanced. Overall, the game requires skill, but for each survivor/killer it's mostly Easy To Learn, Hard To Master. When you win trophies in this game, it really feels like you earned them. 10/10, I play it on a daily basis.
Very good game

very fun with friends, steady learning curve yet requires some skills.
unfortunately, killer wait times when you're a low killer level are much longer since the update.

This game is really fun, The first few hours of the game are very tough but after about 2-3 hours you get better and the game gets way more fun. So if you aren't very good at the game, don't quit it only gets easier. So I would recommend this game to anyone who has a few hours to spend.

If you want to have actual fun on this game, play as killer. BHVR is so unfair to survivors when it comes to bloodpoints that its honestly sad to see survivors gets punished for leavers while the killers get  rewarded. I'll still play this game but i would suggest my friends to go spend their money on a game where its actually fair.

Casi lo único que he jugado el ultimo año. Excelentes mecánicas, entretenido, fácil y a la vez complicado. Con mucho contenido. Después de 300 horas sigo teniendo algunos jump scares hahahaha. Gran juego.

Très peu d'effort des devs pour corriger les bugs et déséquilibres grossiers. Ils ne vont pas attirer des nouveaux joueurs en ajoutant du contenu visuel uniquement, il faut fixer les bases/gamedesign. Tout les streamers Twitch Dbd vous le diront = Ce jeu est full bugé. Après 3 ans, pour un jeu payant, ce n'est pas normal, DU TOUT. Petit mise à jour = Les devs ont eu la bonne idée d'ajouter un sandbox (test future màj) non permanent (PTB) où il faut farmer comme sur le jeu de base, quelle idée stupide, je n'en reviens pas.. Décevant, le jeu pourrait être excellent !

For starters I am not a usual fan of horror, and I do love this game at times. You have to be strategic with how you do things from being the Killer or being a Survivor. And how you play can determine a win. What makes me dislike the game is the freaking timer for being banned from a match now. Sure it is a good idea to keep DCers out of a match for awhile, but if you have my internet you never know how the weather is going to crash it and when. If you do not have good strong internet dont buy the game, mine can be trashy and crashes a lot.

I enjoy this game.  I think the ranking system does a good job of allowing progression based on person skill.  There are certainly bugs in the game however they are not game breaking in my experience.  The game is fun and tactical as both a killer and survivor.

While there are issues and both killers and survivors can be just a tiny tad toxic to one another, I feel like we are entering a state of this game where it will be a lot more fair and balanced in both ways. Older maps are being reworked and brought back out, killers are getting reworks to fit in to the meta now and we just had some major additions to the game such as major testing for servers (some people have had major bugs and stuff with them but they have been fine for me for the most part. Keep in mind the servers aren't out fully yet so of course there will be bugs) and the archives which just dropped as of today. I feel like the devs are taking this game in the right direction and I am glad to see it. I hope they keep it up
great game

Wouldnt say it good or bad but it has alot of opinions on it.

If people want a challenge they should play killer.
The game may still be buggy (even after 3 years of it being out) but I love this game with all my heart due to how the game plays when as a survivor

These Devs are comedians.

Dev's wanted to rework the Nurse's addons. They also claim to be making slight tweaks to her base power.
These slight tweaks turn out to be a second cool down to using her powers.

During the Public Test Build we tested these changes. Not everything is set in stone they said.  Things can change before they go live they said.  We listen to your feed back they said.

Several players took to the Official Feedback forums and expressed their concerns about the changes.  Giving essay long post detailing why the changes make playing the character unfun and gave ways to change the killer to make up for it.

So, PTB closes and no word from the Devs.  Today the changes go live and what do you know the cool down was implemented unchanged.  BUT that's not the funny part!  The addons that reduced the new cool down, addons that were just made during this rework, were NERFED!!! You can't make this stuff up. 

Also starting today they added a Battle Pass system to milk even more money out of their player base.  Need to keep that gravy train going bhvr.  Never know when you'll piss off enough customers.
